inputs.name: messageLimit
inputs.label: Maximum comments to post
inputs.helpMarkDown: Posting too many comments makes the PR hard to read. Highest severity messages will be posted first.

inputs.name: minimumSeverityToDisplay
inputs.label: The minimum sonar severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: Sonar issues with this severity and higher will be post to the PR. Possible values (info,minor,major,critical,blocker)

inputs.name: failedTaskSeverity
inputs.label: The failed task severity
inputs.helpMarkDown: If at least on post issue has the provided severity the task will fail. Possible values (info,minor,major,critical,blocker, or none to disable it)

inputs.name: commentDisplayNamesToDelete
inputs.label: Author Display Names used for Sonar comment deletion
inputs.helpMarkDown: This parameter is only used for delete sonar comments : the task will delete only comments with provided display names
